summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal water system; declaring the estimated cost thereof and authorizing the issuance and sale of $6,000,000 of water utility revenue bonds to provide funds therefor, said bonds to be on a parity with those issued under Ordinances 87150, 88730, 90505, 91792 and 96818 and like bonds hereafter authorized.
